channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Giraffes’ Gut Microbiome Communities Determined By Species, Not Diet
item.description: The giraffe’s gut microbiome is made up of a variety of bacteria and fungi, and is largely determined by the giraffe’s species – not by what they eat.

item.title: … or the highway

item.title: Specific

item.title: You might not get a third chance

item.title: How AI And ML Are Shaping The Future Of SSE
item.description: Today’s vendors in the SSE space have a unique opportunity to address some of the main challenges enterprises are meeting along their AI journeys.

item.title: Harassment Is The Reality For 1 In 4 American Women Online

item.title: AI In DevOps: Taking Business Transformation To The Next Level
item.description: Implementing AI into DevOps requires developing a work environment that supports experimental approaches combined with data-driven insights.

item.title: The opposite of a good idea…
item.description: might also be a good idea. The hard part isn’t finding proof before you begin. The hard part is beginning, knowing you might not succeed.
